column1: Local Foods////Holy Moley. Gourmet sandwich to the max. Soft buttery brie? Duck poached in its own fat? You
column3: can be fancy. And it does taste good as leftovers out of the fridge. Rather Thanksgiving-y. But probably better than your grandma's turkey.   Again
column4: perfect example of how Local takes classic flavors and amps them up a notch.
